list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a piece of paper or small card that gives the holder a certain right, especially to enter a place, travel by public transport, or participate in an event.
a label attached to a retail product, giving its price, size, and other details.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a wet spring would be just the ticket for the garden
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một mùa xuân ẩm ướt sẽ chỉ là vé cho khu vườn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: issue (someone) with an official notice of a traffic offense.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: park illegally and you are likely to be ticketed
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: công viên bất hợp pháp và bạn có khả năng được bán vé

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a passenger) be issued with a travel ticket.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: passengers can now get electronically ticketed
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Hành khách bây giờ có thể được bán vé điện tử

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a retail product) be marked with a label giving its price, size, and other details.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the sports jacket had been ticketed at two hundred dollars
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Áo khoác thể thao đã được bán vé với hai trăm đô la
